name: lob-openapi
description: Tooling for OpenAPI spec for Lob API

scripts.postman: npm run bundle && openapi2postmanv2 --pretty --spec dist/$npm_package_config_bundlefile --output dist/$npm_package_config_postmanfile -O folderStrategy=Tags
scripts.redoc: redoc-cli bundle $npm_package_config_specfile -t actions/redoc/template.hbs --options.hideDownloadButton=true --options.expandResponses='200,201' --templateOptions.segmentKey=0ysbW8vXHeRAnY2saZPMlRSZFfPwd1RO --templateOptions.SUPPORT_URL=https://support.lob.com/hc/en-us --templateOptions.LOB_ASSETS_URL=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/public.lob.com --templateOptions.canonicalUrl=https://docs.lob.com/ --templateOptions.keywords="Direct Mail, Address Verification" --templateOptions.description="Detailed developer documentation for Lob's address verification API and print & mail API. Learn how to easily integrate Lob's APIs within your product or technology stack." --templateOptions.LOB_URL=https://lob.com --templateOptions.image=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/public.lob.com/marketing/opengraph2.png --templateOptions.DASHBOARD_URL=https://dashboard.lob.com/# --title="DRAFT NEW Lob API documentation" --options.noAutoAuth=false --options.maxDisplayedEnumValues=15 --options.theme.colors.primary.main=#27333c --options.theme.sidebar.backgroundColor=#f7f9fa --options.jsonSampleExpandLevel=1 --options.requiredPropsFirst=true --options.theme.typography.code.backgroundColor=#ebf0f6 --options.theme.typography.code.fontFamily=JetBrainsMono --options.theme.typography.code.color=#27333c --options.theme.typography.fontFamily="Larsseit,sans-serif;" --options.theme.typography.links.color=#0099d7 --options.theme.typography.links.textDecoration=none --options.theme.codeBlock.backgroundColor=#ecf0f5 --options.theme.rightPanel.backgroundColor=#f7f9fa --options.theme.rightPanel.textColor=#416581 --options.theme.typography.fontSize=16 -o docs/index.html

author: engineering@lob.com
